name: SONLTE
tag_list: lte, son, 4g, engineering-services, rf-design, network-planning, network-architecture, systems-integration, drive-test, lte-tools
overview:
For current events and spin on LTE, SON and femto networking, have a look at our news and commentary.

Is your business planning to leverage next generation (4G) mobile networking? Need VoLTE or Small Cells guidance? Are you interested in slashing per bit costs by orders of magnitude? If you need help understanding how this can help you or if you are in deployment mode, contact us now. We are battle tested and ready to help.
